Body.description: The procedure disables local user accounts that are members of local Administrators group.

Statement.description: The procedure disables local user accounts that are members of local Administrators group. Version: 0.1.1 Author: Proserv Team - VS The PowerShell script to Local administrators' accounts
Statement.name: GetVariable

Parameter.name: SourceContent
Parameter.value: $LocalAdminGroup = try { Get-WMIObject -Class Win32_Group -Filter """LocalAccount=TRUE and SID='S-1-5-32-544'""" -ErrorAction Stop } catch { $null }; if( $null -ne $LocalAdminGroup ) { $LocalAdminGroup.GetRelated("""Win32_UserAccount""") | Where-Object {$($_.LocalAccount) -And $(-Not $($_.Disabled)) } | ForEach-Object {$_.Disabled = $True; $_.Put()} }
